ERROR_MSGS.ALPHA: The field needs to contain letters only
ERROR_MSGS.EMAIL: The user needs a valid mail format (@site.com) to be created

ERROR_MSGS.DATE: The date of the transaction should be in a valid format (DD/MM/YYYY)
